Package io.github.pirateducks.level

Class GameObject

java.lang.Object
io.github.pirateducks.level.GameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boat, CannonBall, Coin, Fruit, GameObjectHealth, GoldIndicator, HealthIndicator, LangwithCannonball
public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
Class that all objects in the game world extend

  • Method Details

    • setSize

      public void setSize​(float width, float height)
      This method is used to set the width and height of an object
      Parameters:
      width - The new width of the object
      height - The new height of the object

    • render

      public abstract void render​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      This method is used to render the gameObject to the screen
      Parameters:
      batch - The spriteBatch that the game object is rendered as a part of. The batch will already be begun when this is called

    • update

      public abstract void update​(float delta)
      this method is called to update the positional information of the GameObject
      Parameters:
      delta - The delta time since the last update

    • dispose

      public abstract void dispose()
      Use this method to dispose of any resources (ie Texture resources)
